channel.title: reiki on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in reiki on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Fun day at reiki and wandering around Asakusa
item.description: 19:49 Sunday 08 November 2015 JST We attended a reiki share in Asakusa, featuring a reiki master from Kyoto. He was quite friendly and chatty, both in English and Japanese. It was the second time or Lin and I to join this particular reiki share. Afterward, we wandered around Asakusa with Jon, had sushi at a 回転 sushi shop, went to an English book store where we bought a total of three books, and then walked to Tokyo Sky Tree where I got a bunch of gifts for Fred (in a pay-by-the-container system).

item.title: reiki class
item.description: 16:23 Friday 24 April 2015 JST Just said bye to Tomoko after reiki class in Matsudo. We took the same train from Matsudo to Kita-Senju and now I’m headed back to Ye Olde Kawasaki, though this train terminates in Shinagawa. I imagine I could have waited longer in Matsudo in order to get a seat all the way, but there were no such trains on the marquee when we left.

item.title: Reiki meetup in Matsudo
item.description: ##16:09 Sunday 25 January 2015 JST## Thanks to Nobuko for organizing a Reiki class, and thanks to Meetup for showing it to me. It’s nice to reconnect with Reiki energy.

item.title: Going to Reiki workshop
item.description: ##11:27 Saturday 13 December 2014 JST## Via meetup.com, I found a reiki group. They’ve had 37 meetups so far; this will be my first to join. ##5pm Had a good time chatting with Nobuko and Keiko; essentially the event was canceled because the space was taken over by some event.
